overview: Shot and edited in the span of 5 hours, A Truly Regular Night is a video made by practicing film student Doctor Rogers to help show what's he's all about. In visual form. Doctor has come out to say that although not every frame was handcrafted to look at it's supposed to, every frame does have a sort of purpose. Kinda.
tagline: This night is nothing special! At all!
title: A Truly Regular Night
